description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Loot Grinder is an RPG inspired by the 16-bit era classics.  It is all about doing battle and unlocking new classes and abilities.  Customize your team at anytime by assigning job classes that you have unlocked.  These jobs give new abilities as you level up. Travel to a destination long enough to unlock special Boss battles.  If your heroes are strong enough to win, they will be rewarded.
description.short: Loot Grinder is an RPG inspired by the 16-bit era classics.  It is all about doing battle and unlocking new classes and abilities.
